content: back in nyc, man the city's got more life than my coffee rn. just got my usual fix. every time i leave, it's like it reinvents itself. ready to restart my career, but first, let's soak up the vibe.
raw_content: Back in NYC, the city's heartbeat is louder than ever. Just grabbed my first coffee from the usual spot. Reinvents itself every time I'm away. Time to restart my career, but first, let's soak in the energy.

content: Just turned 22 and what a ride it's been. Lost some, gained more. Thinking it's time to start that trading fund I've been talking about. Had a deep convo with my mentor; dude knows his stuff
raw_content: Reflecting on my 22nd birthday. This year's been a whirlwind of losses and gains. Building a personal trading fund feels like the right next step. Had a heart-to-heart with my mentor; his insights are invaluable.
